#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define p(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define s2(a,b) scanf("%d %d",&a,&b)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define vi vector<int>
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define F first
#define S second
#define P printf
typedef long long ll;
#define pl(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
using namespace std;
#define db(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << endl;
#define db2(x, y) cerr << #x << ": " << x << " | " << #y << ": " << y << endl;
#define db3(x, y, z) cerr << #x << ": " << x << " | " << #y << ": " << y << " | " << #z << ": " << z << endl;
#define db4(a, b, c, d) cerr << #a << ": " << a << " | " << #b << ": " << b << " | " << #c << ": " << c << " | " << #d << ": " << d << endl;
#define db5(a, b, c, d, e) cerr << #a << ": " << a << " | " << #b << ": " << b << " | " << #c << ": " << c << " | " << #d << ": " << d << " | " << #e << ": " << e << endl;
#define db6(a, b, c, d, e, f) cerr << #a << ": " << a << " | " << #b << ": " << b << " | " << #c << ": " << c << " | " << #d << ": " << d << " | " << #e << ": " << e << " | " << #f << ": " << f << endl;
ll kedane_min(int* arr,int n)
{
    ll ans=arr[0],temp=arr[0];
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        temp=min((ll)arr[i],temp+arr[i]);
        ans=min(ans,temp);
    }
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
   #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("ip.txt","r",stdin);
   #endif
   int t;s(t);
   while(t--)
   {
       int n;s(n);
       int arr[n];
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)s(arr[i]);
       ll temp=kedane_min(arr,n);
       temp=min(temp,0LL);
       ll sum=0;for(int i=0;i<n;i++)sum+=arr[i];
       temp*=-2;
       sum+=temp;
       pl(sum);printf("\n");


   }



}
